description:
Hit one target with your staff 
and regain some mana.
name: Strike
note:
Skill #1 will be used when you select
the Attack command.

description: Focus, regaining some mana.
name: Focus
note:
Skill #2 will be used when you select
the Guard command.

description: A basic blast of elemental fire.
name: Fire Burst

description: A basic blast of elemental water.
name: Water Burst

description: A basic blast of elemental air.
name: Air Burst

description: A basic blast of elemental earth.
name: Earth Burst

description:
A blast of elemental fire, potentially
lighting the target on fire.
name: Flame Charge

description:
A blast of elemental water that
also heals the user.
name: Tidal Flow

description:
A blast of elemental air that
hits two targets.
name: Wind Slash

description:
A blast of elemental earth that
penetrates magical defenses.
name: Stone Shot

description:
A massive blast of elemental fire, hitting two 
targets and potentially lighting them on fire.
name: Flare Strike

description:
A massive blast of elemental water that 
hits two targets and also heals the user.
name: High Tide

description:
A massive blast of elemental air
that hits all enemy targets.
name: Whirlwind

description:
A massive blast of elemental earth that 
penetrates defenses and hits two targets.
name: Earthquake

description:
Inflame the target's inner inferno,
doubling their attack.
name: Inferno

description:
A stream of healing water
that heals one ally.
name: Healing Water

description:
Form a cloak of wind around the target, 
granting them a 50% dodge rate.
name: Cloak of Wind

description:
Create a barrier of stone around the
target, boosting their defense.
name: Stone Barrier

description:
Create a bright sphere of light, lightly
boosting the attack of all allies.
name: Sunlight

description:
A blast of ice that deals damage,
and might cut the target's defense.
name: Ice Blast

description:
A blast of lighting that deals damage,
and might cut the target's attack.
name: Lightning Blast

description:
Grow plants all over the battlefield,
boosting the defense of all allies.
name: Overgrowth

description:
A combination fire and earth attack,
dealing penetrating damage.
name: Magma Strike

description:
A combination water and air attack,
dealing damage to two targets.
name: Hurricane

description:
A combination air and fire attack, scorching the
target and potentially lighting them on fire.
name: Heatwave

description:
A combination earth and water attack, 
dealing damage and healing the caster.
name: Mud Slide

description:
Create a beam of light, dealing
heavy damage to one foe.
name: Solarbeam

description:
Create a shell of ice around an ally, massively
boosting their defense for two turns.
name: Ice Armor

description:
Overcharge the target's mana, extremely
boosting their attack power for two turns.
name: Volt Charge

description:
Channel the energy of nature 
to heal one target.
name: Regrowth

description:
A wave of elemental fire that always
lights the target on fire.
name: Ring of Flame

description:
A special water spell, restoring a fallen 
ally to the fight with 50% maximum health.
name: Revival

description:
A wave of static that drains 25% 
of the target's remaining mana.
name: Mana Drain

description:
Bless the target with earth's might, 
restoring their health over time.
name: Vital Pulse

description:
A combination fire and earth attack, dealing 
heavy penetrating damage to two targets.
name: Eruption

description:
A combination water and air spell, 
restoring 50% of an allies health.
name: Healing Wave

description:
A combination air and fire attack, scorching 
two targets and boosting the user's attack.
name: Firestorm

description:
A combination water and earth spell, healing
an ally and bolstering their defenses.
name: Mud Slide

description:
A combination fire and water spell, healing
the target and boosting their attack power.
name: Soothing Steam

description:
A combination air and earth attack,
hitting two random targets.
name: Sand Storm

description:
A combination fire and water attack, dealing heavy 
damage and potentially lighting the target on fire.
name: Steam Vent

description:
A combination air and earth spell, granting
all allies 100% evasion for 1 turn.
name: Sand Veil

description:
Fill the target with the fire's fury,
boosting their attack and defense.
name: Flame's Rage

description: A mist of healing water that heals every ally.
name: Mist of Life

description:
A rush of slashing wind, harming the target and
granting the caster a 50% dodge rate.
name: Backdraft

description:
Create a spikes of stone, harming the target
and boosting the caster's defense.
name: Wall of Spikes

description: A basic rune of elemental fire.
name: Fire

description: A basic rune of elemental water.
name: Water

description: A basic rune of elemental air.
name: Air

description: A basic rune of elemental earth.
name: Earth

description: Boost an elemental rune's power.
name: Boost

description:
Shift an elemental rune to 
its linked force.
name: Shift

description: Call upon the spiritual aspects of a spell.
name: Infuse

description: Meld together two elemental runes.
name: Union

description:
A rune of cosmic power. At your skill level, you
can't combine it with more than one other rune.
name: Cosmic

description:
Placeholder for an additional 
rune, if I need it.
name: == Null ==

description:
Create an aura of light, healing 
the caster and the target.
name: Soothing Light

description:
A wave of ice that cuts the
defense of two targets.
name: Freezing Wave

description:
A wave of static that cuts the
attack of two targets.
name: Static Wall

description:
Grow ensnaring plants around the target,
penetrating defense and ignoring evasion.
name: Ensnare

description:
A wave of light, dealing heavy 
damage to two targets.
name: Cruel Sun

description:
A storm of ice that damages two 
targets and cuts their defense.
name: Blizzard

description:
A storm of lighting that damages two 
targets and cuts their attack.
name: Thunderstorm

description:
Drains life from the target over 
time, healing the caster in the process.
name: Leech Energy

description:
An uncontrolled blast of elemental fire, dealing 
heavy damage, but missing 40% of the time.
name: Fire Crash

description:
An uncontrolled blast of elemental water, dealing 
heavy damage, but missing 40% of the time.
name: Water Crash

description:
An uncontrolled blast of elemental air, dealing 
heavy damage, but missing 40% of the time.
name: Air Crash

description:
An uncontrolled blast of elemental earth, dealing 
heavy damage, but missing 40% of the time.
name: Earth Crash

description:
Create an aura of light, restoring all
knocked out allies to 50% maximum health.
name: Restore Life

description:
A wave of ice that damages the targets, cuts 
their defences and grants the caster armor.
name: Deep Freeze

description:
A wave of static that damages the target, cuts 
their attack power and overcharges the caster.
name: Volt Charge

description:
Grow ensnaring plants around every foe,
penetrating defense and ignoring evasion.
name: Forest's Wrath

description:
A combination fire and earth spell, boosting
the caster's attack and defense power.
name: Magma Fortress

description:
A combination water and air spell, purging all
positive status effects from the target.
name: Fog

description:
A combination air and fire spell, granting the 
caster 50% evasion and boosting their attack.
name: Updraft

description:
A combination water and earth spell, healing the
caster over time and bolstering their defenses.
name: Swamp's Might

description:
A combination fire and water attack, dealing 
heavy damage and always striking first.
name: Cloud Nine

description:
A combination air and earth attack, totally
bypassing the target's defense and evasion.
name: Desolation

description:
Summon a spirit of your element to assist 
you in battle.
name: Summon Spirit

description: Unsummon your summoned spirit.
name: Banish Spirit

description: A blast of cosmic energy.
name: Cosmic Burst

description:
An uncontrolled blast of cosmic energy, dealing 
heavy damage, but missing 40% of the time.
name: Cosmic Crash

description:
A wave of cosmic energy, hitting two 
random targets.
name: Starbolt

description:
Creating a cloak of darkness, the caster
gains 100% evasion for one turn.
name: Shadow Cloak

description:
Connect to the flow of magic, regaining 
mana over time.
name: Stellar Flow
